content.rendered:
• Diet and supplements are recommended after detailed clinical assessments and analysis of blood reports. We recommend consulting a physician before starting out with any course of treatment.
  • Our courses and programs are based on expert experiences, detailed learning and customer feedback being the most vital part. The clients are requested to thoroughly understand our process, price details, terms and conditions before enrolling in any services.
  • In case of any food allergies or health related concerns while following our diet, we recommend you raise the concern with our nutrition expert immediately.
  • We do not assure any ‘guarantee’ for the achievement of targets, however, based on our expertise and experience one can achieve realistic goals.
  • Taking a break from the diet (except in case of an emergency) in between a session is not encouraged. In case the client fails a given diet in a session, no extension is allowed.
  • If the client does not follow the diet or does not appear for regular consultations within the regular window, the course will lapse automatically.
  • If a follow-up appointment is due, if the client is unable to contact our nutrition expert, missed an appointment, or the nutrition expert was not reachable, we advise the client to immediately call our support to schedule another appointment.

@graph.name: Terms and Services - Echha Joshi
@graph.description: Diet and supplements are recommended after detailed clinical assessments and analysis of blood reports. Click to read more.

@graph.name: Echha Joshi
@graph.description: As a clinical nutritionist, my passion for personalized nutrition is driven by my unwavering commitment to helping individuals achieve optimal health and wellbeing. With a Postgraduate degree in Clinical Nutritional Sciences and a Master's degree in Clinical Nutrition, I possess an extensive understanding of the impact of different foods and nutrients on the body, and how they can be utilized to prevent and treat a range of health conditions. My approach to nutrition is both precise and tailored to each individual's unique needs. My personalized nutrition counseling takes into account medical history, lifestyle, and personal preferences, providing guidance that is both effective and enjoyable. I am experienced in working with individuals who have a wide range of health concerns, including diabetes, heart disease, and gastrointestinal disorders. Beyond my work in individual counseling, I am committed to promoting the importance of nutrition for overall health and disease prevention. My insights and expertise have been widely recognized and respected in the field, with several publications featuring my contributions. If you are seeking a refined, evidence-based approach to nutrition, I would be honored to connect with you. Together, we can work towards achieving optimal health and wellbeing, unlocking your full potential for a healthier and happier life.
